message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique item is valued at $120 by us due to its exceptional features and craftsmanship. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or serve your needs perfectly. Would you like to explore this opportunity further?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and craftsmanship of your product. However, I am looking for a more competitive price. Would you be willing to consider $90 for the product?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value and uniqueness of the item, we propose a price of $105. This still reflects our commitment to maintaining fair pricing while acknowledging your concerns.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate the adjustment. However, I would like to make a counteroffer of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to present a counteroffer of $102 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to valuing both the quality of the item and your feedback.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $98 for the product.

Thank you for your thoughtful response, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your previous offers, I am willing to accept $99 for the product. This price allows us to maintain a fair valuation while accommodating your budget.
